Handwashing Aid: You can use a rubber duck in the bathroom to remind yourself to wash your hands regularly. You can place it on the sink or in the bathtub.
Pet Toy: You can use a rubber duck as a toy for your pets, especially for dogs. You can toss it around and watch your pet try to catch it.
Sound Machine: You can use a rubber duck to make sounds. You can squeeze it or blow into it to make sounds similar to a duck quack.
Cooking Aid: You can use a rubber duck as a cooking aid. You can use it to create foam for cocktails, or use it to measure ingredients for recipes.
Home Decor: You can use a rubber duck as a home decor item. You can display it in your kitchen, bathroom, or living room.
